resources.string: An application creates an Equalizer object to instantiate and control an Equalizer engine in the audio framework. The application can either simply use predefined presets or have a more precise control of the gain in each frequency band controlled by the equalizer.
Media Player class is the primary API for playing sound and video
Audio Manager class manages audio sources and audio output on a device
Playlist:list returns a collection of playlists that match the API request parameters.
